thing-type.label: GREE Air Conditioner
thing-type.description: This Thing represents a GREE Air Conditioner

parameter.name: broadcastAddress
parameter.label: Subnet Broadcast Address
parameter.description: Broadcast IP address of the local subnet.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Update Interval
parameter.description: Interval to query an update from the device.

channel-type.label: Mode
channel-type.description: Sets the operating mode of the Air Conditioner: Auto: 0, Cool: 1, Dry: 2, Fan: 3, Heat: 4

channel-type.label: Turbo
channel-type.description: Set on/off the Air Conditioner's Turbo mode.

channel-type.label: Air
channel-type.description: Set on/off the Air Conditioner's Air function if applicable to the Air Conditioner model.

channel-type.label: Dry
channel-type.description: Set on/off the Air Conditioner's Dry function if applicable to the Air Conditioner model .

channel-type.label: Wind Speed
channel-type.description: Sets the fan speed on the Air conditioner: Auto:0, Low:1, MidLow:2, Mid:3, MidHigh:4, High:5. The number of speeds depends on the Air Conditioner model.

channel-type.label: Health
channel-type.description: Set on/off the Air Conditioner's Health function if applicable to the Air Conditioner model.

channel-type.label: Swing Vertical
channel-type.description: Sets the vertical swing action on the Air Conditioner: Full Swing: 1, Up: 2, MidUp: 3, Mid: 4, Mid Down: 5, Down : 6

channel-type.label: Power Save
channel-type.description: Set on/off the Air Conditioner's Power Saving function if applicable to the Air Conditioner model.

channel-type.label: Light
channel-type.description: Enable/disable the front display on the Air
